name: Silent Vac
description:
A stealth-action roguelike-like.

It's a very simple game with a lot of potential for strategically planned level completions. Or, just run around and shoot enemies randomly!

You play as a vacuum with a vengeance, running around eliminating enemy robots from your house. The objective is to escape each level after assassinating the ivory wardens. It's a lot tougher than it may seem though...

This game was created for a game jam.

Features:

  • Sneak around and backstab enemies
  • Plenty of procedurally generated random levels
  • Free-roam sandbox-style gameplay
  • Fully featured skill upgrade system
  • 17 awesome weapons to play with
  • 22 unique enemies with compelling AI

Let's be stealthy!
